thought: To craft an oak_boat, I need to place three oak_planks in the top row of the crafting grid, and two more in the middle row. Therefore, I will start by moving one oak_plank from slot 29 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 1 with quantity 1
